1   package com.stormpath.shiro.servlet.env;
2   
3   import org.apache.shiro.util.StringUtils;
4   import org.apache.shiro.web.env.EnvironmentLoader;
5   import org.apache.shiro.web.env.EnvironmentLoaderListener;
6   import org.apache.shiro.web.env.WebEnvironment;
7   
8   import javax.servlet.ServletContextEvent;
9   import javax.servlet.ServletContextListener;
10  
11  /**
12   * Bootstrap listener to startup and shutdown the web application's Shiro
13   * {@link WebEnvironment} at ServletContext startup and shutdown respectively.  This class exists only to
14   * implement the {@link ServletContextListener} interface. All 'real' logic is done in the parent
15   * {@link EnvironmentLoader} class.
16   * <h2>Usage</h2>
17   * Define the following in {@code web.xml}:
18   * <pre>
19   * &lt;listener&gt;
20   *     &lt;listener-class&gt;<code>com.stormpath.shiro.web.servlet.env.StormpathShiroEnvironmentLoaderListener</code>&lt;/listener-class&gt;
21   * &lt;/listener&gt;
22   * </pre>
23   * Configuration options, such as the {@code WebEnvironment} class to instantiate as well as Shiro configuration
24   * resource locations are specified as {@code ServletContext} {@code context-param}s and are documented in the
25   * {@link EnvironmentLoader} JavaDoc.
26   * <h2>Shiro Filter</h2>
27   * This listener is almost always defined in conjunction with the
28   * {@link org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.ShiroFilter ShiroFilter} to ensure security operations for web requests.  Please
29   * see the {@link org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.ShiroFilter ShiroFilter} JavaDoc for more.
30   * <BR/><BR/>
31   * In addition this {@link ServletContextListener} will set the default Shiro environment class to {@link StormpathShiroIniEnvironment}
32   * if the <code>shiroEnvironmentClass</code> init parameter is not set.
33   *
34   * @see EnvironmentLoader
35   * @see org.apache.shiro.web.servlet.ShiroFilter ShiroFilter
36   * @see com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.filter.StormpathFilter
37   */
38  public class StormpathShiroEnvironmentLoaderListener extends EnvironmentLoaderListener {
39  
40      @Override
41      public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent sce) {
42  
43          String environmentClassParam = sce.getServletContext().getInitParameter(EnvironmentLoader.ENVIRONMENT_CLASS_PARAM);
44          if (!StringUtils.hasText(environmentClassParam)) {
45              sce.getServletContext().setInitParameter(EnvironmentLoader.ENVIRONMENT_CLASS_PARAM, StormpathShiroIniEnvironment.class.getName());
46          }
47  
48          super.contextInitialized(sce);
49      }
50  }
